content: & useful links all row are worked on the right front side & fastened off at the end of every row see the paragraph mosaic crochet basics & useful links geometrica| © bebablanket 2024 page 3 of 10 mosaic in a month cal information this pattern is a part of mosaic in a month afghan cal crochet-along further in the text cal if this pattern is a part of your cal project be sure you start with multiples of 48+3 in this case you will have 2 patterns of geometrica repeats within one repeat of the cal 2x24+3 the cal is hosted by juniper & oakes crochet community on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/juniperandoakes/ find more information about this cal https //dtbeba--juniperandoakes thrivecart com/mosaic-in-a-month-crochetalo ng/663a1a739f1cf/ the entire bundle of the patterns of this cal can be purchased https //dtbeba--juniperandoakes thrivecart com/mosaic-in-a-month-crochetalo ng/ geometrica| © bebablanket 2024 page 4 of 10 geometrica layout 4 repeats in width x 2 repeats in height geometrica| © bebablanket 2024 page 5 of 10 geometrica chart geometrica| © bebablanket 2024 page 6 of 10 geometrica written pattern foundation cord - any number of multiples of 24+3 color a all row are worked on the right front side & fastened off at the end of every row note the pattern is written for layout see picture on page 5 for the cal see information on page 4 adjust the number of repeats x 4 according to your project size row 1 stsc 24sc x 4 2sc color a row 2 stcsc 24sc x 4 1sc 1csc color b row 3 stcsc 4dc 5sc 3dc 1sc 3dc 5sc 3dc x 4 1dc 1csc color a row 4 stcsc 4sc *1dc 3sc* x 5 x 4 1sc 1csc color b row 5 stcsc *3sc 1dc* x 2 1sc 2dc 3sc 2dc 1sc 1dc 3sc 1dc 2sc color a x 4 1sc 1csc row 6 stcsc 1dc 7sc 1dc 2sc 1dc 1sc 1dc 2sc 1dc 7sc x 4 1dc color b 1csc row 7 stcsc *1sc 1dc* x 2 5sc *1dc 2sc* x 2 1dc 5sc 1dc 1sc 1dc color a x 4 1sc 1csc row 8 stcsc 2sc 1dc 7sc 1dc 3sc 1dc 7sc 1dc 1sc x 4 1sc 1csc color b row 9 stcsc 5sc 4dc 2sc 1dc 1sc 1dc 2sc 4dc 4sc x 4 1sc 1csc color a row 10 stcsc 1dc 3sc 1dc 4sc *1dc 2sc* x 2 1dc 4sc 1dc 3sc x 4 color b 1dc 1csc row 11 stcsc *1sc 1dc* x 2 2sc 2dc 2sc 1dc 3sc 1dc 2sc 2dc 2sc color a 1dc 1sc 1dc x 4 1sc 1csc row 12 stcsc *2sc 1dc* x 3 2sc 3dc *2sc 1dc* x 3 1sc x 4 1sc 1csc color b row 13 stcsc 1dc 3sc 1dc 1sc 1dc 2sc 1dc 5sc 1dc 2sc 1dc 1sc color a 1dc 3sc x 4 1dc 1csc row 14 stcsc 1sc 3dc 3sc 1dc 2sc 5dc 2sc 1dc 3sc 3dc x 4 1sc color b 1csc
